original: Zachrisson, Bruno, disponent, boktryckare, Göteborg, f. 15/7/90 i Gbg av boktr. Waldemar Z. o. Beda Carlberg. G. 16 m. Elsa Lillienau. Barn: Tor, Per-Olof, Karin, Gösta. — Stud:-ex. 09, yrkesstud. i Wien 09, i Magde-burg 10-11 o. i Bradford 11. Anst. h. Wezäta 11, v. dir. där 20 o. verkst. dir. 24-40, disp. i Esseltes Gbgsind. A-B o. Wezäta-Gbgslitogr. A-B. Sekr. f. int. boktr :kongr. i Gbg 23, led. av Sv. mässans styr. o. verkst. nd. Led. av styr. f. Gbgs Golvkl. o. f. Gbgs o. Bohusl. turisttrafikfören.
translated: Zachrisson, Bruno, manager, printer, Gothenburg, b. 15/7/90 in Gothenburg, son of printer Waldemar Z. and Beda Carlberg. Married in 1916 to Elsa Lillienau. Children: Tor, Per-Olof, Karin, Gösta. Completed secondary school exams in 1909, vocational studies in Vienna in 1909, in Magdeburg in 1910-1911, and in Bradford in 1911. Employed at Wezäta from 1911, vice director there from 1920, and executive director from 1924-1940. Also worked as a manager at Esseltes Gbgsind. A-B and Wezäta-Gbgslitogr. A-B. Secretary for international printing congress in Gothenburg in 1923, member of the board of directors for the Swedish trade fair and executive committee member. Also served on the board of directors for Gothenburg Flooring Association and Gothenburg and Bohuslän Tourism Association.
